ReactorEE.pcomponents

Class ConnectorPipe

  • java.lang.Object
    • ReactorEE.pcomponents.PlantComponent
      • ReactorEE.pcomponents.ConnectorPipe
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ConnectorPipe
extends PlantComponent
    ConnectorPipe class only really extends PlantComponent for consistency in the model. It is effectively completely invisible to the user and is used to connect up multiple paths between components in the system.
    Author:
    Lamprey
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • addOutput

        public void addOutput(PlantComponent output)
        Adds an output to this ConnectorPipe. Use this method instead of setOutput().
        Parameters:
        output - Component to connect to the output of this ConnectorPipe.

      • getInputs

        public java.util.ArrayList<PlantComponent> getInputs()
        Use this method instead of getInput().
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of all PlantComponents connected as inputs to this ConnectorPipe.

      • getOutputs

        public java.util.ArrayList<PlantComponent> getOutputs()
        Use this method instead of getOutput().
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of all PlantComponents connected to the output of this ConnectorPipe.
